passage: Wanda Diaz-Merced is an astrophysicist who lost her sight when she was young. Diaz-Merced's condition inspired her to develop software that can translate scientific data into sound. Sound-based tools ______ blank scientists to detect subtle patterns in data. Such patterns may not be evident in traditional graphs.
question_text: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?

answer_rationales.B: Choice B is the best answer. The convention being tested is subject-verb agreement. The plural verb "enable" agrees in number with the plural subject "sound-based tools."
answer_rationales.A: Choice A is incorrect because the singular verb "has enabled" doesn't agree in number with the plural subject "sound-based tools."
answer_rationales.C: Choice C is incorrect because the singular verb "is enabling" doesn't agree in number with the plural subject "sound-based tools."
answer_rationales.D: Choice D is incorrect because the singular verb "enables" doesn't agree in number with the plural subject "sound-based tools."
